R: PRP VBP TO VB PRP TO DT NN WRB :

A: -         we immediately (close to where tokenization happens) resolve styles per token
R: : PRP RB -LRB- RB TO WRB NN VBZ -RRB- NN NNS IN JJ

A: -         store only those styles (this means changing the theme will drop all the cached tokens)
R: : NN RB DT NNS -LRB- DT VBZ VBG DT NN MD VB PDT DT JJ NNS -RRB-

A: -         render using only those styles (e.g. there is no need to render the CODE_SEGMENT class name if no rule in the theme will select it), we can either inline them (i.e. CODE_SEGMENT) or generate tailored class names (with short unique names that will hopefully help the browser do its magic faster).
